Benchmark Dataset
==================

The list of graphs included in the benchmark library are as follows:

* barbell graph
* binary community graph
* barabasi albert graph
* random geometric graph
* waxman graph
* watts strogatz graph
* duplication divergence graph
* powerlaw cluster graph
* stochastic block model
* r mat graph
* hyperbolic graph
* stochastic kronecker graph
* lfr benchmark graph

We vary various attributes of these graphs to generate the benchmark.

.. _barbell graph:
	http://mathworld.wolfram.com/BarbellGraph.html

.. _binary community graph:

.. _barabasi albert graph:
	http://barabasi.com/f/622.pdf

.. _random geometric graph:
	https://www.cs.upc.edu/~diaz/TRANSPES/RGG_HK.pdf

.. _waxman graph:
	https://arxiv.org/pdf/1506.07974.pdf

.. _watts strogatz graph:
	http://homepage.cs.uiowa.edu/~sriram/196/spring12/lectureNotes/Lecture8.pdf

.. _duplication divergence graph:
	https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2092385/

.. _powerlaw cluster graph:
	https://arxiv.org/abs/1411.6247

.. _stochastic block model:
	https://arxiv.org/abs/1703.10146

.. _r mat graph:
	https://www.cs.cmu.edu/~christos/PUBLICATIONS/siam04.pdf

.. _hyperbolic graph:

.. _stochastic kronecker graph:
	http://www-cs-students.stanford.edu/~xuying/papers/kronecker3.pdf

.. _lfr benchmark graph:
	https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lancichinetti%E2%80%93Fortunato%E2%80%93Radicchi_benchmark
